//: Ensure these items are synced across projects

scripts.test_yarn: npm run yarn2 && npm test && npm run fix
scripts.coverage_test: cd && npm run line && nyc mocha "./{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.runner.js"  --timeout 3000 && cd
scripts.coverage_report: cd && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && codecov && cd
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage_test && npm run coverage_report
scripts.status: npm run line && git log --since=2.weeks --pretty=format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s" && git status
scripts.commit: cd && npm run fix && git add . && git commit -a -m "config updates" && cd
scripts.commitAll: npm run yarn2 && npm run fix && npm run commit && npm test && npm run push
scripts.commitFast: cd && npm run line && npm run commit && npm run push && git status && cd
scripts.pull: cd && npm run line && git pull && npm run yarn2 && npm test && cd
scripts.gitfix: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m ".gitignore fix"
scripts.push: echo Push and release patch to master... && cd && git push origin master
scripts.prep: npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch
scripts.release: cd && npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch && start npm run push
scripts.beta: npm run commit && npm run release
scripts.ncu: cd && ncu -u -l info --timeout 70000 && cd && npm run yarn2
scripts.upgrade: npm run ncu && npm run commit && npm run release && npm run line
scripts.install: cd && yarn global add babel-eslint codecov mocha nyc snazzy standard
